title: 放置带命令的命令方块
author: _雨夜丶

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
setblock ~～~ command_block 0 replace {Command:"say 1"}
有错找我

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content: LZ可以试试setblock ~ ~1 ~ {BlockEntityTag:{Command:xxx}}复制代码xxx处填写LZ要的指令。

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content: setblock ~ ~1 ~ command_block 0 1 {BlockEntityTag:{Command:xxx}}复制代码上面的指令给错了{:10_493:}

replies.author: chyx
chyx
replies.txt_content:
End-Enderman 发表于 2015-6-15 18:00
上面的指令给错了
不能说BlockEntityTag是give的
应该说give做这件事需要BlockEntityTag
其他不能通过其他方法指示的物品里的放置后方块实体附加值都用BlockEntityTag 
远不仅限于give
